attributes.action: Reverse the Cut to IB State Funded Schools.
attributes.additional_details: We want the government to do this, as this is an issue close to our hearts. Schools are being forced to revert back to A-Levels, and students deserve the choice. The IB says: “If the Department for Education carries out this plan, its savings will be minimal but there will be significant costs to students in loss of choice and opportunity in a globally competitive environment.” IB students are 3 times more likely than matched A level students to enrol in a top-20 higher education institution.
attributes.background: We would like the government to reverse the decision to cut of  funding for the IB program for IB state schools.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Stop changes to the large programme uplift funding to protect our education
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/746219
